personal_info.name: Mohammed Ashikur Rahman
personal_info.description: Senior Software Engineer with over 5 years of experience building scalable, secure backend systems and full-stack applications using Node.js, TypeScript, NestJS, Docker, AWS, and modern development best practices.

primary_degree.description: Completed BSc in Computer Science with specialization in Artificial Intelligence from BRAC University in late 2018. The program emphasized algorithms, AI technologies, and included an industrial placement to gain real-world development experience.

work_experience.description: Leading backend architecture and development using NestJS (TypeORM Architecture), NextJS, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL. Responsible for deploying production-ready applications on AWS EC2, managing CI/CD with GitHub Actions, and overseeing containerized infrastructure using Docker, Nginx, and Certbot.
Provided client-facing technical consulting and participated in full-stack software development, improving both technical depth and stakeholder communication.
Led backend development using PHP and Laravel, focusing on reporting systems, analytics tools, and business intelligence features. Strengthened data analysis and software design skills.
Internship focused on learning Laravel and enterprise PHP development, contributing to team projects in a real-world corporate IT environment.

personality_traits.approach: I approach every project with a focus on clean, maintainable code, efficient system design, and a commitment to staying ahead with new technologies.

portfolio.description: A collection of professional and personal projects that demonstrate backend scalability, full-stack integration, and cloud infrastructure expertise.

contact_info.availability: Open to collaborations and new opportunities
contact_info.approach: Feel free to reach out to discuss projects, job opportunities, or anything tech-related!

conversation_topics: Education and AI background at BRAC University
